name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Engageable - Time block with Google Calendar

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A mindful pulse for better attention.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Engageable is the mindful pulse of energy you need for better attention. Now, link your Google Calendar to block off time for deeper, more focused work, studying, or play.

Make any Google Calendar event more engaging and focused. Just create an event and hit the button to make that time engageable. Follow the link in the event to get the energy you need to dive into any task.
